value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.09938v1", "title": "On the divisibility of sums of Fibonacci numbers", "summary": "We show that for infinitely many odd integers $n$, the sum of the first $n$\nFibonacci numbers is divisible by $n$.
